ComicInfo.Summary: We have seen the future, and it's war! Enter the world of Iron Reich 3000, where, from the lowliest grunt in the trenches to the elite pilots in the gigantic war-bots, everybody fights so that some might survive. Then, in Angel, Cordelia and her filmmaker companions discover that the "Helm of Harxis" is guarded by a cabal of demons. Plus, Mike Manley's Monsterman proves that there's nothing cooler than being a monster, man! Now in flip book format.
